sentences.english: If she were rubbing the ends of the stalks, she would be guilty of threshing .
sentences.chinese: 如果她被搓完的秸稈，她將是有罪的脫粒。

sentences.english: Its technical key is to explore straw resources and saprophagous food Chains.
sentences.chinese: 秸稈資源和腐食食物鏈的開發是技術關鍵。

sentences.english: This paper expatiated on progress in microbiologic utilization technology of crop straw.
sentences.chinese: 本文闡述了微生物處理秸稈的研究進展。

sentences.english: This article also make a primary discussion on best storage condition of straw biologic fertilizer.
sentences.chinese: 還對秸稈生物肥的最佳貯存條件進行了初步探討。

sentences.english: Fifth, the contrast experiment on the straw and horse dung is designed.
sentences.chinese: 設計了秸稈與馬糞聯合發酵的對比試驗。

sentences.english: With the improvement of heat sublimation transfer technology, heat sublimation transfer paper will be further developed.
sentences.chinese: 綜述了國內外秸稈高值化利用技術的發展現狀與趨勢。

sentences.english: Therefore, return wheat straw to field is better than return corn straw from the point of view of potassium balance.
sentences.chinese: 從鉀素營養歸還的角度考慮，應優先將小麥秸稈還田。

sentences.english: The study was done to understand the correlation between grain yield and stover IVDMD of maize.
sentences.chinese: 瞭解玉米品種籽粒產量與秸稈飼用品質的關係。

sentences.english: The invention provides a method for making pictures with corn or sorghum stalks.
sentences.chinese: 本發明提供了一種用玉米秸稈和秫秸稈制畫的方法。

sentences.english: A new type of cotton stalk shredding and used polythene film collecting combined machine was developed and designed.
sentences.chinese: 摘要研製了棉秸稈切碎及殘膜回收聯合作業機。

sentences.english: Results showed that mulched treatments had significant effect on increasing yield.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，秸稈覆蓋有明顯的增產效果。

sentences.english: The protein feed was converted by corn stalk fermented with multi-bacteria.
sentences.chinese: 以玉米秸稈爲原料，經多菌體發酵生產蛋白飼料。

sentences.english: Check whether the straw in gasification device is burn out. If so, add straw.
sentences.chinese: 檢查氣化爐內秸稈是否燒穿，如燒穿應添加秸稈。

sentences.english: Check whether the straw in gasification device is burn out. If so, add straw.
sentences.chinese: 檢查氣化爐內秸稈是否燒穿，如燒穿應添加秸稈。

sentences.english: All of these straw treatments raised the content of olsen-P and effective K in soil.
sentences.chinese: 所有秸稈處理都提高了土壤中速效磷和速效鉀的含量。

sentences.english: The roof, which came next, has a layer of straw bales for insulation and is covered with sheets of plastic to make it waterproof.
sentences.chinese: 其次是屋頂，用秸稈捆覆蓋，外加塑料板以防水。

definition: rotation of crops (to preserve fertility of soil)
